rect.title: 10.0; jointly. We formalize this intuition as follows. We create a neural network with; null

g.text: jointly. We formalize this intuition as follows. We create a neural network with

rect.title: 10.0; the architecture shown in Figure 2. This architecture is a single network with; null

g.text: the architecture shown in Figure 2. This architecture is a single network with

rect.title: 10.0; two pathways. The ﬁrst pathway operates on the cropped bounding box of the; null

g.text: two pathways. The ﬁrst pathway operates on the cropped bounding box of the

rect.title: 10.0; region (the “box” pathway) while the second pathway operates on the cropped; null

g.text: region (the “box” pathway) while the second pathway operates on the cropped

rect.title: 10.0; bounding box with the background masked (the “region” pathway). The two; null

g.text: bounding box with the background masked (the “region” pathway). The two

rect.title: 10.0; pathways are disjoint except at the very ﬁnal classiﬁer layer, which concatenates; null

rect.title: 10.0; the features from both pathways. Both these pathways individually have the; null

g.text: the features from both pathways. Both these pathways individually have the
